# function: oci

```terraform
output "service" {
  value = provider::opsy::oci("ocid1.tenancy.oc1..aaaaaaaabyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyq")
}

output "region" {
  value = provider::opsy::oci("ocid1.instance.oc1.iad.aaaaaaaabyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyq")
}
```



## Signature

<!-- signature generated by tfplugindocs -->
```text
oci(ocid string) object
```

## Arguments

<!-- arguments generated by tfplugindocs -->
1. `ocid` (String) OCID of oci resources


## Return Type

The return type of `oci` is a object of keys service and region.
